DOC.brief_summary: This study determine influence methylphenidate ( e.g. , Ritalin® ) duloxetine ( Cymbalta® ) , alone combination , cocaine use measure self-report urine drug screen .
DOC.criteria: Recent cocaine use Seeking treatment cocaine use Abnormal screening outcome ( e.g. , ECG , blood chemistry result ) study physician deem clinically significant Current past history substance abuse dependence deem study physician interfere study completion History serious physical disease current unstable physical disease ( e.g. , past myocardial infarction , uncontrolled hypertension , diabetes , head trauma , seizures CNS tumor ) current past history serious psychiatric disorder suicidal risk , substance abuse dependence , exclude research participation Females currently use effective birth control Contraindications cocaine , methylphenidate duloxetine Currently use opioids pain currently maintain methadone buprenorphine opioid use disorder exclude participation Body weight less 50 kg
